name: Pool Ball Battle Royale
description: Get ready for the ultimate pool ball showdown! In this fast-paced game, players control their own pool balls and try to knock each other into the holes. Use strategy and quick reflexes to outmaneuver your opponents and emerge victorious. With colorful graphics and realistic physics, this game will have you on the edge of your seat as you try to become the last ball standing. So grab your cues and let's get ready to rumble in the pool ball arena!
